trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Greensboro
There was one other sighting in Greensboro on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting detailswas watching "neighborhood" (next-door type) fireworks and my daughter and i saw a very bright red\orange "blob" of light. kind of looked like three orbs together, but it was so bright it was hard to tell an actual shape. at first it looked like a firework, but we soon realized it was a craft of some sort that was traveling from the southwest to the east-northeast. constant rate of speed, straight line, then slow left to north-northeast, then we lost sight of it behind trees. absolutely no noise of any kind. struck me odd because it was not that high up in the sky, and i was hoping to hear either a propeller or a jet engine. we live near an airport (and have for twenty years) and are very familiar with all sorts of air traffic. this stood out as something i have never seen. i also saw the same type of thing was reported in florida the same night. weird. (and no, i was not drinking!)
Summary: Red/orange bright light across sky.... no noise at all.
